text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Gold Ship and I successfully make it<n>back to school. The
next day, I attend<n>her race...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Students chatter amongst themselves<n>while waiting for the
races to kick off.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
We're here at the track, and I'm<n>Golshi, reporting live from
the race.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I've got a fledgling trainer here for an<n>exclusive interview. ☆
Tell me, are you<n>excited to be here today?
choice_data_list: You really do have a race today...
You really do have a race today...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, way to break the immersion.<n>How many times do I
have to drill it<n>into you?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I need you more than ever today, so<n>time to step up. Feel
me? A racer has<n>to have a trainer to enter the Twinkle<n>
Series, see?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I managed to fake my way through<n>the application process
without one,<n>but there's no way that would fly at<n>the
actual race.
choice_data_list:
So it didn't matter who you got to be your
trainer?!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Scuse me? ...You still have no ideawhy I chose you specifically?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Look, you've been watching us<n>training from the sidelines
since<n>forever, haven't ya?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Even in the worst weather, you'd be<n>there every day with
such enthusiasm<n>in your eyes... Whenever I saw you,<n>all I
could think was...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Wow, this trainer has literally nothing<n>better to do... Ya
know?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
That said, I can always get a decent<n>reaction out of you, and
we groove<n>together pretty well. I've kinda grown<n>to like
you!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Ah, it's just about time.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Welp, I'd better make use of all this<n>pent-up hunger! Get
ready—I'm about<n>to blow your mind!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She may mess with me constantly,<n>but as I watch her head
off toward the<n>track, I can't help getting excited to<n>see her
race.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And now, Gold Ship's big debut<n>begins!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Things start off relatively well. As the<n>race progresses, she
manages to hold<n>onto her position.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
They've made the last turn. It's the<n>final stretch! The lead is
breaking for<n>it! Will this decide the race?!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: URAAAAAAGH!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Now Gold Ship is pushing ahead with<n>incredible speed!
She's three lengths<n>behind! One length!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And she pulls ahead at the finish!<n>Gold Ship takes the win
with a<n>stunning debut!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
What an amazing race! I'm<n>completely mesmerized by the
way<n>she ran!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Woohooo! Victory!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Well, pretty impressive, huh? The<n>mighty Golshi has plenty
more where<n>that came from!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I know, right? I'm the fastest! I'm the<n>brightest star! Can't
help it—I was<n>just born this way!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Well, your face is positively shining<n>after watching me!
You've never<n>looked happier than this!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
So, that means you have no problem<n>staying on as my
trainer, right?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I was sort of duped into all of this,<n>but... the excitement I felt
during her<n>race was real, so...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Good! Together we shall defend the<n>world from evil!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Gold Ship's debut ends in success,<n>and I officially become
her trainer. I'm<n>sure it'll be smoother sailing from<n>here...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: GAAARGH! I need more hunger!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: How many days till my next race?<n>Three? Two?!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Agh, if this keeps up, my burning<n>spirit won't last much
longer! I won't<n>be able to run anymore...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
You know what that means—treasure<n>hunting time! Our
adventure for pure,<n>concentrated agitation begins!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Our destination awaits—the final<n>frontier, SPACE!
HRAAAAAGH!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After a long, desperate struggle, I<n>finally convince Gold Ship
that we<n>shouldn't go to space.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's the most dynamic<n>Umamusume I've ever seen. I'll<n>
need to become more vigorous<n>myself for whatever hurdles
are sure<n>to come...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Gold Ship and the Battle for EarthThe End
